00022 /*
00023  * This is special direct interface to bignum implementation. Most code should 
00024  * use interface in number.h.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #ifndef H__dfsch__bignum__
00028 #define H__dfsch__bignum__
00029 
00030 #include <dfsch/dfsch.h>
00031 #include <dfsch/strings.h>
00032 #include <stdint.h>
00033 #include <stdlib.h>

00035 typedef struct dfsch_bignum_t dfsch_bignum_t;
